CONCERNING THE EFFICIENCY OF THE METHODOLOGY 
Time in minutes 
37. How many minutes have you devoted to the activity 1 identify the type of general ontology to 
be reused? 
 
38. How many minutes have you devoted to the activity 3 search for general ontologies 
 
39. How many minutes have you devoted to the activity 4 carry out a comparative study? 
 
40. How many minutes have you devoted to the task 5.1 analyze the host CQs? 
 
41. How many minutes have you devoted to the task 5.2 identify the features of the general 
ontologies? 
 
42. How many minutes have you devoted to the task 5.3 determine the general ontology that best 
fits? 
 
43. How many minutes have you devoted to the task 6.1 prune the general ontology? 
 
44. How many minutes have you devoted to the task 6.2 enrich the general ontology? 
 
45. How many minutes have you devoted to the task 6.3 translate the general ontology? 
 
46. How many minutes have you devoted to the task 6.4 evaluate the obtained general ontology? 
 
47. How many minutes have you devoted to the activity 7 integrate the general ontology? 
 
48. How many minutes have you devoted to test the host ontology? 
 
 
COMMENTS AND SUGGESTIONS: 
 
We are especially interested in the comments and suggestions for those features to 
which you have assigned lower values (1, 2 or 3).
speaker: SYSTEM
